name: Loch NES
description:
Loch NES

A cryptozoological stealth game inspired by „Snake.“ Published as part of the 3 hour game jam trijam173 „You are the monster“.

Made by Taxicomics and Amusician

Defend, devour, dodge!

Defend as Nessi the mysteries of the Loch against hordes of truth-seeking tourists.

Devour them to survive and grow in size. Attention: Don’t bite your own tail!

Dodge various threats for your mythos: Tourist will try to proof your existence by taking pictures, some of them might even chase you by boat! 

Controls

Press ❎ to start

Press ⬅️➡️⬆️⬇️ to move

Further Instructions:

The "!"-Meter increases if you are in a tourist's area of sight (marked by a red circle). It shows the level of attention, so don't get caught!
